short_summary: Bid for the procurement of 12 All-Terrain Vehicle, (ATV) 4x4, 4 Stroke Gasoline Engine and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Gander.
description: A bid is being made for the procurement of 12 All-Terrain Vehicle, (ATV) 4x4, 4 Stroke Gasoline Engine and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Gander. It was requested that deliverables be made within 240 days of the contract award.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Procurement

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

| Attribute | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | PW-22-01009110 |
| **Solicitation Number** | W8476-226585B |
| **Publication Date** | October 4, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | November 8, 2022 at 14:00:00 |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |

#### Tender Details

The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to procure 12 All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) 4x4 units, each equipped with a 4-stroke gasoline engine. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the vehicles to CFB Gander within 240 days from contract award.

#### Contract Terms

| Attribute | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Contract Duration** | 2022-11-16 to 2023-10-15 |
| **Delivery Timeframe** | 2022-11-16 to 2023-06-15 |

#### Bidder Eligibility

 Suppliers not excluded from the solicitation documentation may submit a bid. For more information, please contact Kyle Grundy, the contracting authority.

#### Supporting Documents

The RFP, amendment, and other relevant documents are available on the [Canada BUs](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/d61b1ecb20121bd5c14cb14de27d477c/en-amendment001-w8476-2265585_b.pdf) website.

#### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Contracting Entity

The contract will be awarded by the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Contact Information

Kyle Grundy
Contracting Authority
DND
kyle.grundy@forces.gc.ca

---

Tender announcements often omit important operational details. Where model specifications and quantities are not specified, please note
